thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Jeff P
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Jeff P

author: Jeff P
title: Jeff P
text:
Low prices, and I get my codes immediately. I tried to buy a game from another site, while some friends were waiting for me to play. I waited for 20 minutes to get the code and it still hadn't shown up.
So, I went to Bundle Stars, bought it and the code was there in seconds. That's how things should be.
